content: So the one thing that we're really doing here and that's extremely helpful to predictability and efficient growth is just putting even more resources than we did last quarter in favor of the corporate business, because when you have a business thatâs growing 30% and then the segment of that business that's growing 50% and you can hire reps, because in many ways we home grown these reps, you can hire them much more easily and train them and then they can produce so much quicker and ramp quicker and generate business quicker.
